com.teamten.render
Interface Light

All Known Implementing Classes:
DirectionalLight
public interface Light

Represents a light source and the algorithm to light a point.

Method Summary
 Color getLightColor(Intersection intersection)
          Return the color of the light at this intersection point.
 Vector getLightVector(Intersection intersection)
          Return a unit vector from the intersection point to the light.
 void setCamera(Matrix camera)
          Sets the camera transform for this pass.
 

Method Detail

getLightVector

Vector getLightVector(Intersection intersection)
Return a unit vector from the intersection point to the light. The intersection must not be empty and must be in camera space.

getLightColor

Color getLightColor(Intersection intersection)
Return the color of the light at this intersection point. The intersection must not be empty and must be in camera space.

setCamera

void setCamera(Matrix camera)
Sets the camera transform for this pass.
